ADd this

above

then under

Add

if(c.playerRights == 0) for(int i : AdminItems) if(wearID == i) { c.sendMessage("You must be a Admin+ to wear this item."); return false; }
and add this

case 773: // Perfect Ring c.AdminReq = 1; c.Adminreq = 2; return;
under

then add this

with the rest of these.

not sure if it’ll work with the AdminReq, but try it.[/quote]

item.title: Perfect ring
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

[quote=“Jerico Pimpinbro, post:3, topic:405837”][quote author=strucker link=topic=502826.msg3678717#msg3678717 date=1311388453]

if its delta go to item.cfg,and add this

item = 773 ‘perfect’_ring A_perfect_ruby_ring. 14000000.99280576915 14000000.99280576915 1760.58823743125 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000

then to make it only admin wearable do this on client.java
1- search for public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {
then add this

if(wearID == 773 && playerRights < 2)
{
sM(“you must be an admin to wear this.”);
yell(""+playerName+" got a pring…");
return false;
}
[/quote]

Holy shit, let me clean this up.

if(wearID == 773 && playerRights <= 2) {
yell("" + playerName + " has equipped a perfect ring!");
return;
} else {
sM("You need to have rights over or equal to 2 to wear this.");
return;
}

Hopefully I did that correctly.

You might need different methods depending on what your base is.[/quote]
PI base sorry bro.

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect ring
item.dc:creator: @Jerico_Pimpinbro Jerico Pimpinbro
item.description:
@Jerico_Pimpinbro wrote:

[quote=“strucker, post:2, topic:405837”]if its delta go to item.cfg,and add this

item = 773 ‘perfect’_ring A_perfect_ruby_ring. 14000000.99280576915 14000000.99280576915 1760.58823743125 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000

then to make it only admin wearable do this on client.java
1- search for public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {
then add this

if(wearID == 773 && playerRights < 2)
{
sM(“you must be an admin to wear this.”);
yell(""+playerName+" got a pring…");
return false;
}[/quote]

Holy shit, let me clean this up.

if(wearID == 773 && playerRights <= 2) {
yell("" + playerName + " has equipped a perfect ring!");
return;
} else {
sM("You need to have rights over or equal to 2 to wear this.");
return;
}

Hopefully I did that correctly.

You might need different methods depending on what your base is.

item.title: Perfect ring
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

thisis for delta. i suppose you have already changed the values in item.cfg

then to make it only admin wearable do this on client.java
1- search for public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {
then add this

if(wearID == 773 && playerRights < 2)
{
sM(“you must be an admin to wear this.”);
yell(""+playerName+" got a pring…");
return false;
}

post if i helped , thanks!
–strucker
